title: Ireckon - Android Wear
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
description: Let the world know what you think about the latest hot topics! For instance,Who is the world's favourite Harry?Who was the World Cup's best player?And if you were in the Matrix would you take the red or the blue pill?See what everyone else reckons on the Ireckon website here - http://ireckon.fife-v.com/If you'd like to pose your own query, send us your question (along with the answers) by emailing ireckon@fife-v.comIreckon is a survey App for the Android Wear Platform from Fife-V. Privacy disclaimer: Ireckon records no personal data, just your answers. So you are guaranteed to never have your details sold to spammers or advertisers.
descriptionHTML:
Let the world know what you think about the latest hot topics! For instance,

Who is the world's favourite Harry?
Who was the World Cup's best player?
And if you were in the Matrix would you take the red or the blue pill?

See what everyone else reckons on the Ireckon website here - http://ireckon.fife-v.com/

If you'd like to pose your own query, send us your question (along with the answers) by emailing ireckon@fife-v.com

Ireckon is a survey App for the Android Wear Platform from Fife-V.

Privacy disclaimer: Ireckon records no personal data, just your answers. So you are guaranteed to never have your details sold to spammers or advertisers.
comments: Moto 360... Where's the love? This is an adorable app for wear, but it doesn't play well AT ALL with moto 360. Words are cut off on every edge but the top.
Frivolous fun Amusing way to spend a train journey. Needs more questions though.
